name: 123 Animal Puzzles
description:
123 Animal Puzzles is very fun puzzle game for kids 2+ there is in total 123 puzzles

-30 Easy puzzles
-70 Normal puzzles
-23 Hard puzzles

Very fun and beautiful puzzles for kids 2+! Your child will love 123 Animal Puzzles, with beautiful animal pictures + fun background music.

Puzzles range from 3 to 7 pieces, and you can choose the difficulty.

123 animal puzzle levels
Fun balloon celebrations when a puzzle is finished
Change difficulty to easy, normal or hard
Hours of entertainment for your child!
Very Fun for children 2+
Great music

Privacy Policy-
This app:
- Does not contain ads
- Does not contain links to social networks or any website
- Does not use data collection tools
